summary:
I am a UX/UI designer with over 9 years of experience in conceptualizing and crafting digital products, helping businesses and non-profits expand their capacity for impact. I have a background in brand strategy and marketing and gained expertise in discovering the most uncovered human insight and using it strategically to design behavior-changing products, services, and campaigns. 

As a side business, I help aspiring design students build a career they love by mentoring on online platforms such as ADPlist. I also enjoy designing learning experiences and sharing my knowledge and passion for design and technology by developing curriculums for bootcamps.

Please reach out via Linkedin DM if you want to explore what we can do together.

projects: [{'title': 'NetEdu Project', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': "The NetEduProject is an international interconnected community of leaders, educators, and researchers that is growing, aiming to cultivate and weave local learning ecosystems to effectively respond to our society and planet's challenges. I lead the development and execution of the SchoolWeavers digital tool and enlargement of the NetEdu community in Turkey.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Özge', 'last_name': 'Karakaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior User Experience Designer'}]}, {'title': 'Good Practices in Education Conferences', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'The Conference, organized by Education Reform Initiative and supported by Sabancı Foundation and Sabancı University, is continuously held since 2003. It aims to generate new platforms that will enable educators to get together to share their creations and good practices. In addition to presentations of good practices, the conference program is enriched with workshops, banner presentations, which set the stage for face-to-face dialogue among participants across various educational topics. The conferences allow participants such as the representatives of the Ministry of Education, teachers, academics, representatives from civil society organizations, parents, representatives from the private sector with a stake in education, and students to collaborate and communicate across different fields of study and different levels.\n\nEvery year the Conference is curated around a theme and communicated as a social awareness campaign under the same theme. The campaigns are widely accoladed for their success in raising societal engagement at the most prestigious advertising award ceremonies in Turkey.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Özge', 'last_name': 'Karakaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior User Experience Designer'}]}, {'title': 'Transformation of Emerging Countries from Destination to Source of Foreign Direct Investment (FDI). Example of Turkey.', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': "Master's thesis written in the framework of the course 'Transnational Corporations and the European Economic Space' under supervision of Prof. Paolo Guerrieri. ", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Özge', 'last_name': 'Karakaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior User Experience Designer'}]}, {'title': 'Unsafe Toys of Europe: Mattel Recalls', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': "Business case written in the framework of 'Seminar on Business Cases' at College of Europe under supervision of Prof. Jacques Pelkmans, Prof. Aimé Heene and Assist. Joanna Dreger. My goal was to make reader think and discuss on the effects of Mattel recall crisis on EU regulations and on international supply chain management.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Özge', 'last_name': 'Karakaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior User Experience Designer'}]}, {'title': 'Turkish National Week at College of Europe', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': 'As the leader of the organizing team, the event was curated for College of Europe students, professors, and staff. For the full week event, the organizing team raised a 20.000€ budget with almost 20 different sponsors among which there are Turkish Airlines, the Ministry for EU Affairs, TÜSİAD, BELKAD, and Efes Pilsener. After the event was successfully held, the remaining budget was donated to "Baba Beni Okula Gönder" campaign by the organizing team for covering the education expenses of two girl students.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Özge', 'last_name': 'Karakaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior User Experience Designer'}]}, {'title': 'Analysis of Consumer Responses to Toyota Recalls on Online Media', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': "A qualitative research on Toyota recall crisis and Toyota's image repair strategies conducted by Prof. Nazlı Wasti-Pamuksuz. [{'company': {'id': 714038, 'name': 'Commencis', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFWRMIzQg82hg/company-logo_400_400/0/1678953885463?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=arVer7hrCJ-FRLQdKlpI6Gcomv9pc2Lc5qEYYIpmP94', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/commencis/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Commencis', 'description': None, 'title': 'Senior User Experience Designer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Commencis', 'description': "- Redesigning the user experience of MobilDeniz, the mobile app of DenizBank, with more than 10 million+ users. 
- Designing user flows and wireframes for the bank's new services and redesigning the user experience of existing services in line with the business goals. 
- Preparing test scenarios for usability tests, and incorporating research findings in the designing process. 
- Conducting sprint planning for new projects.
- Supporting the foundation of the Design Research and Strategy department, coordinating user research activities, preparing usability heuristic reviews, and developing strategic concepts for clients from various domains.

Other clients:
